IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: SEE SCHEDULE O. THE BLOOMSBURG UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION, INC. INSPIRES AND STEWARDS PHILANTHROPY AND OTHER REVENUE GROWTH IN SUPPORT OF COMMONWEALTH UNIVERSITY - BLOOMSBURG.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE BLOOMSBURG UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION, INC. INSPIRES AND STEWARDS PHILANTHROPY AND OTHER REVENUE GROWTH IN SUPPORT OF BLOOMSBURG UNIVERSITY.
IRS990.Desc: SCHOLARSHIPS - THE BLOOMSBURG UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION (BUF) PROVIDES SCHOLARSHIPS AND AWARDS TO MORE THAN 1000 STUDENTS AT COMMONWEALTH UNIVERSITY (CU). THESE SCHOLARSHIPS PROVIDE RESOURCES TO HELP RECRUIT STUDENTS, REWARD INCOMING FRESHMEN FOR THEIR HARD WORK AND TO RETAIN RETURNING STUDENTS. THIS SUPPORT IS INSTRUMENTAL IN HELPING THE UNIVERSITY REACH ITS GOAL OF PROVIDING A QUALITY EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCE AT AN AFFORDABLE COST. IT ALLOWS CU TO BE A PREMIER PUBLIC COMPREHENSIVE UNIVERSITY, RECOGNIZED AS A CENTER FOR THINKING, LEARNING AND ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE. IT ALSO HELPS OUR UNIVERSITY TO CONTINUE TO ANTICIPATE AND ADDRESS THE CHANGING NEEDS OF THE COMMONWEALTH AND TO BE A DIVERSE COMMUNITY THAT PRODUCES POSITIVE CHANGE AND ENCOURAGES A CULTURE OF GOOD STEWARDSHIP OF OUR RESOURCES AND THE ENVIRONMENT, DEVELOPING INDIVIDUALS WHO WILL BE CONTRIBUTING CITIZENS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: ACADEMIC PROJECTS - FUNDING PROVIDED BY THE BUF SUPPORTS A NUMBER OF ACADEMIC PROGRAMS THAT ENHANCE THE EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCE FOR CU STUDENTS. PROJECTS FUNDED BY THE BUF COVER AREAS THAT INCLUDE, BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO: ACADEMIC PROGRAMS, ADVANCEMENT AND DEVELOPMENT, TRAVEL, PUBLIC SERVICE, EXTERNAL RELATIONS, ARTWORK AND RESEARCH. THESE PROGRAMS SERVE AS THE FOUNDATION OF THE PRINCIPAL RESOURCES FOR CU FACULTY, STAFF AND STUDENTS. THEY SUPPORT THE UNIVERSITY'S EFFORTS TO EXPAND PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT AND EXPERIENTIAL LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES THAT OCCUR BEYOND THE CLASSROOM SETTING AND ARE VITAL IN PREPARING CU STUDENTS TO ENTER A COMPETITIVE WORKFORCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: ATHLETIC PROJECTS - THE BUF PROVIDES SCHOLARSHIP AND PROGRAM SUPPORT TO APPROXIMATELY 340 STUDENT-ATHLETES OF BLOOMSBURG UNIVERSITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: OTHER PROJECTS - THE BUF PROVIDES PROGRAM SUPPORT AND FUNDING FOR FACULTY AND STAFF, FACULTY AND STAFF RECRUITMENT AND RESEARCH, AS WELL AS EMERGING OPPORTUNITIES TO ALLOW THE UNIVERSITY TO RESPOND DECISIVELY AND TO CAPITALIZE ON NEW AREAS OF ACADEMIC PROGRAMMING, STUDENT OPPORTUNITIES AND CAPITAL PROJECTS THAT WILL HELP TO ENSURE THE CONTINUED ADVANCEMENT AND SUCCESS OF COMMONWEALTH UNIVERSITY.ALUMNI ASSOCIATION - THE BUF PROVIDES ACTIVITIES AND PROGRAM SUPPORT FOR THE 75,000 ALUMNI OF COMMONWEALTH UNIVERSITY.ADMINISTRATIVE SUPPORT - THE BUF PROVIDES PROGRAMS TO ALL FACULTY AND STAFF OF COMMONWEALTH UNIVERSITY TO FURTHER DEVELOP THEIR SKILLS.LIBRARY PROJECTS - THE BUF PROVIDES SUPPORT TO THE STAFF AND STUDENTS OF THE CAMPUS LIBRARY TO ENSURE MATERIALS ARE AVAILABLE TO STUDENTS FOR THEIR EDUCATIONAL NEEDS.THE CALCULATED COST TO RAISE A DOLLAR AT BUF IS $0.34 WITH A RETURN ON INVESTMENT TO THE UNIVERSITY OF $4.39 PER EVERY DOLLAR.

USAddress.AddressLine1Txt: BLOOMSBURG UNIV FDN 50 E MAIN ST

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ARTISTIC ITEMS ARE DISPLAYED FOR PUBLIC BEAUTY
ENDOWMENTS ARE HELD TO GENERATE INVESTMENT INCOME THAT IS USED TO FUND SCHOLARSHIPS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE STUDENTS ATTENDING COMMONWEALTH UNIVERSITY.

THE FOUNDATION ADHERES TO THE PROVISIONS OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD (FASB) ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION (ASC) 740, INCOME TAXES (ASC 740). ASC 740 ESTABLISHES RULES FOR RECOGNIZING AND MEASURING TAX POSITIONS IN AN INCOME TAX RETURN, INCLUDING DISCLOSURES OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS (UTPS). ASC 740 MANDATES THAT ORGANIZATIONS EVALUATE ALL MATERIAL INCOME TAX POSITIONS FOR PERIODS THAT REMAIN OPEN UNDER APPLICABLE STATUTES OF LIMITATION, AS WELL AS POSITIONS EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN FUTURE RETURNS. THE UTP RULES THEN IMPOSE A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD ON EACH TAX POSITION. AN ORGANIZATION CAN RECOGNIZE AN INCOME TAX BENEFIT ONLY IF THE POSITION HAS A "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" (I.E. MORE THAN 50 PERCENT) CHANCE OF BEING SUSTAINED ON ITS TECHNICAL MERITS. DURING 2023, THE FOUNDATION HAS TAKEN NO MATERIAL TAX POSITIONS ON ITS APPLICABLE TAX FILINGS THAT DO NOT MEET THE MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THRESHOLD. AS A RESULT, NO AMOUNT FOR UTPS HAS BEEN INCLUDED IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FOUNDATION IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS. THE FOUNDATION BELIEVES IT IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS FOR YEARS PRIOR TO FISCAL YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2020.
